author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

My rule is to leave kids alone if they don't willingly choose to enter the arena. Barron Trump and Ella Emhoff live their own non-political lives. Hope Walz, Tampon Tim's daughter, wants to be a TikTok influencer. Plus, she does that ANNOYING THING where she ends every SENTENCE with an upward INFLECTION as if she's asking a QUESTION. I hate that.

Here she is calling Trump a b*tch baby while attacking him for doing something about the crime-ridden cesspool known as our nation's capital. Hope manages to work race and the left's booty "crime down 30%" talking point into it as well.

It also sounds like she was in the middle of a
title: Tampon Tim Walz's daughter goes on anti-Trump rant, calls him "b*tch baby" for cleaning up Washington DC

author: Brodigan
description:
The UK is trying something interesting in order to go after people who are catcalling joggers. If only there was something that all of the perpetrators had in common… Washington, D.C. isn’t a state and it’s not just because we haven’t gotten around to it. It was never intended to be and never should be, but let’s explain why. Tucker Carlson interviewed a Palestinian Christian nun who lives on the West Bank. We know what you’re thinking. There’s no way that got weird.

UK COPS GONE WILD
title: 🔴 Watch! Tucker Carlson's Controversial Palestine Interview: Good Journalism or Nefarious Standard? (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

It was well understood that Washington DC is a violent and crime-riddled cesspool that, according to statistics and pie charts, isn't as violent as it was during the start of the crack epidemic. Donald Trump agrees, and decided to do something about now. Now, all of a sudden, we are to believe the violence and crime are fake news and DC is a great place to live.

At least, on the record. Off the record, leftists are glad someone is finally doing something. They just can't say so out loud because derpity derp Orangman bad.

title: DC influencer calls on people to resist Trump's takeover, shuts down replies once they respond about the REAL DC

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

To protest JD Vance vacationing in the UK, a group of angry Brits is driving a truck around town with a Vance meme on it. Not only can the left not meme, but there needs to be a 25% tariff on slacktivism.

The derptastic demonstration is compliments of "Everyone Hates Elon," and I know what you're thinking... yes, a group that calls itself "Everyone Hates Elon" is in fact stupid.

A van displaying an altered image of US Vice President JD Vance drove through the English town of Charlbury near where he was holidaying with his family. The stunt was organized by the B
title: Activists think they're owning JD Vance by driving this silly truck around town while he vacations
